title: World of Tanks Blitz - XRay, Wallhack, ESP
text:
Hi! You've probably heard of such a popular online game as World of Tanks? If Yes, then you know that this game has a mobile version of the client and this game is called World of Tanks Blitz and today we are pleased to provide you with a free, and most importantly a working cheat on the game World of Tanks Blitz from the developer of hacks Errorc0de. This hack is fully optimized and ready to use, it runs exclusively on your computer, I think you do not need to explain how to run the game World of Tanks Blitz on your computer, if necessary, then create a separate tutorial.

Now about really hack. What this cheat does? It has only one single function - this function is called Xray or Wallhack, as well as ESP, who as convenient. The feature will trace your enemies colored outline and tet making them visible through the textures on the map, simply put you will see your enemies through the walls, inclined and all sorts of obstacles on the map. There is also an adjustment of the contour, you can change it yourself using the slider.all sorts of obstacles on the map. There is also an adjustment of the contour, you can change it yourself using the slider.
